data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Peñuelas, Puerto Rico need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Peñuelas, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 5.45 percent of the people of Peñuelas are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Peñuelas.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Peñuelas, Puerto Rico to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Tallaboa Alta
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Tallaboa Alta, Peñuelas, Puerto Rico.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Peñuelas, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,275 believers in Peñuelas to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Peñuelas, Puerto Rico has a population of 19,300.

We estimate Peñuelas has 6,275 people who might know Jesus, 11,973 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,052 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Peñuelas, Puerto Rico that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.
